name: Correct answers to individual factual knowledge questions, by respondent characteristic: 2018
description: Correct answers to individual factual knowledge questions, by respondent characteristic: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_the_center_of_the_earth_is_very_hot_true_
variableMeasured.description: The Center Of The Earth Is Very Hot True

variableMeasured.name: field_the_continents_have_been_moving_their_location_for_millions_of_years_and_will_continue_to_move_true_
variableMeasured.description: The Continents Have Been Moving Their Location For Millions Of Years And Will Continue To Move True

variableMeasured.description: Does The Earth Go Around The Sun Or Does The Sun Go Around The Earth Earth Around Sun

variableMeasured.name: field_all_radioactivity_is_man_made_false_
variableMeasured.description: All Radioactivity Is Man Made False

variableMeasured.name: field_it_is_the_father_s_gene_that_decides_whether_the_baby_is_a_boy_or_a_girl_true_
variableMeasured.description: It Is The Father S Gene That Decides Whether The Baby Is A Boy Or A Girl True

variableMeasured.description: How Long Does It Take For The Earth To Go Around The Sun One Day One Month Or One Year One Year A

variableMeasured.name: field_antibiotics_kill_viruses_as_well_as_bacteria_false_
variableMeasured.description: Antibiotics Kill Viruses As Well As Bacteria False

variableMeasured.name: field_human_beings_as_we_know_them_today_developed_from_earlier_species_of_animals_true_b_
variableMeasured.description: Human Beings As We Know Them Today Developed From Earlier Species Of Animals True B

variableMeasured.name: field_electrons_are_smaller_than_atoms_true_
variableMeasured.description: Electrons Are Smaller Than Atoms True

variableMeasured.name: field_lasers_work_by_focusing_sound_waves_false_
variableMeasured.description: Lasers Work By Focusing Sound Waves False

variableMeasured.name: field_the_universe_began_with_a_huge_explosion_true_c_
variableMeasured.description: The Universe Began With A Huge Explosion True C

notes: Responses of "don't know" and refusals to respond are counted as incorrect and are not shown.
sources: NORC at the University of Chicago, General Social Survey (2018).Science and Engineering Indicators
